name: Bacon and Shrimp Tacos with Pineapple Salsa
author: Farmland
summary: Marinated grilled shrimp are served in tortillas topped with cabbage, fresh pineapple salsa, and crisp crumbled bacon.
ingredients: ¼ cup finely chopped red onion
12 ounces fresh or frozen medium shrimp in shells (thawed if frozen), peeled and deveined
8 (6 inch) white corn or flour tortillas
2 cups shredded green or red cabbage (or use a combination)
directions: For Pineapple Salsa, in a small bowl, combine pineapple, tomato, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, and salt
Bacon and Shrimp Tacos: In a large skillet cook bacon over medium heat until browned and crisp
Remove to paper towels to drain; crumble bacon
In a large bowl stir together the teriyaki sauce, orange juice, ginger, and crushed red pepper
Remove half of the sauce and set aside
Add shrimp to remaining sauce in bowl and toss to coat
For a gas or charcoal grill, grill shrimp in a grill basket set on the rack of a covered grill directly over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes or until opaque, turning once
Serve shrimp in tortillas topped with cabbage, Pineapple Salsa, and bacon
